common.supportMailRemainMsg: Please send the text as it is.
common.errorRetry: An error occurred. Please try again.
common.invalidAmount: Amount is too small. Enter a value of at least 1 sat.

home.failLaunchTitle: It's taking too much time to boot up wallet
home.failLaunchMsg:
Press "Restart" to restart app
Press "Wait" to wait until wallet is unlocked
home.alertChannelBackupMsg: The auto backup function does not seem to be activated. Please turn on Auto Backup in the detail settings screen.
home.alertChannelManualBackupMsg: You have not obtained the latest backup. Please create and save a backup from the Advanced Settings screen.
home.exportAllTxsMsg: Do you want to output data for all transactions?
home.refundMsg: You have Bitcoin that cannot be transferred via invoice. Would you like to process a refund?
home.alertSwapMsg:
This onchain address does NOT belong to your wallet.
This is used for deposits, and by sending sats to it, you will create a channel automatically, and the Lightning balance will be credited to you as Outbound capacity with minus fees.
home.selectReceiveChain: Select the method you would like to receive a payment.
home.existPending: There is a channel in process
home.existPendingAlert:
There is a channel in process.
Over time, {{amount}} sats will become refundable.
Do not uninstall the application until this alert disappears over time.
home.existPendingAlert0sat:
There is a channel in process.
Do not uninstall the application until this alert disappears over time.
home.notConfirmedPassphraseMsg:
Passphrase confirmation is not complete.
This alert will disappear once the confirmation is complete.
home.existPendingRefundAlert:
There is a transaction in process.
Over time, {{amount}} sats will become refundable.
Do not uninstall the application until this alert disappears over time.
home.existPendingRefundAlert0sat:
There is a transaction in process.
Do not uninstall the application until this alert disappears over time.
home.notConnectedHub:
The connection to the relay hub, which is required to use this function, cannot be confirmed.
Please wait for a while and try again.
home.capacityReachLimit:
The wallet reaches maximum capacity (maxinum: {{amount}} sats).
You can receive within {{receive}} sats at Lightning.
home.needUpdate:
Update has coming.
Please update before using the application.
home.needRebalance:
Since there are multiple channels, they are combined into one before transitioning to QR reading.
If 'No' is selected, the transition will continue in its current state.
home.failedToProcessIntent: Payment failed due to unknown destination.

settings.maxFeeRateLargeMsg:
Large Fee Rate.
Are you sure?
settings.maxFeeRateMemo: Find a payment route with the maximum fee rate multiplied by the maximum fee (the maximum fee will be at least {{min}} sats).
settings.googleDriveBackupMessage: Do you want to turn on Google Drive backup?
settings.googleDriveBackupDisableMessage: Do you want to turn off Google Drive backup?
settings.icloudDriveBackupMessage: Do you want to turn on iCloud Drive backup?
settings.icloudDriveBackupDisableMessage: Do you want to turn off iCloud Drive backup?
settings.manualAppDbRestore: Manual: App data recovery and restart
settings.setNeutrinoSub: Restart is require to apply the change.
settings.neutrinoDescriptionTitle: Enter the address of the neutrino server
settings.neutrinoDescriptionMsg:
This will allow LND to connect to a designated neutrino server.
Leave blank to disable this feature.
settings.watchtowerNotActiveMsg:
A restart is required to enable it.
Do you want to restart?
settings.watchtowerDescriptionTitle: Enter the LND watchtower server URI
settings.watchtowerDescriptionMsg: This will allow LND to connect to a watchtower server.
settings.noStore: The current setting cannot be loaded. Apply the default value.

detailSettings.biometricsAuthConfirmMsg: To enable biometric authentication, authenticate at the device.
detailSettings.biometricsAuthIsNotSupport: Your device does not support biometric authentication.
detailSettings.biometricsAuthIsNotEnrolled: Register biometric authentication in the device settings first.
detailSettings.notSetLock: Please set the Screen Lock first.
detailSettings.confirmDescription: Please enter the number again for confirmation
detailSettings.enableLockMsg: Do you want to enable locking by PIN code when the application is launched?
detailSettings.disableLockMsg:
Screen locking is currently enabled. If this will be disabled, biometrics authentication will also be disabled.
Would you like to disable this?
detailSettings.rescanWalletMessage:
Restart application and rescan Bitcoin wallet from Blockchain.
It takes very long time.
Are you sure?
detailSettings.selectChain: Select the chain of transactions you wish to check.
detailSettings.nothingTransaction:
There are currently no transactions to display.
Return to the previous screen.
detailSettings.closeAllMsg:
Close all channels.
Are you sure?
detailSettings.screenshotPreventMsg:
Screenshots are currently prohibited on certain screens.
Would you like to cancel?
detailSettings.resetWalletStartMessage: Any balance remaining in the wallet will also be deleted. Both the passphrase and the backup file are required to restore the wallet and redeem the balance.
detailSettings.resetWalletMessage: If you wish to continue the process, please enter the No.{{num}} word of your passphrase below.
detailSettings.attentionPassphrase: Passphrase confirmation is not complete. Wallet cannot be restored without a backup of the passphrase.
detailSettings.attentionExistChannels: Channel exists. If not closed, funds may be lost. To close, execute "Close All Channels" in the Advanced menu.
detailSettings.attentionExistPendings: There is a channel in process, please check the alert on the Home screen.
detailSettings.attentionExistRefunds: There is a refundable balance, please check the alert on the Home screen.
detailSettings.attentionExistRefundPendings: Preparing to refund, please check the alert on the Home screen.

tutorial.text1: Connect Nayuta Wallet with other wallets and lapps to extend their features and usefulness. You can also control permission levels depending on the application.
tutorial.text2:
Nayuta Wallet enables a Lightning auto-payment feature.
Fast, cheap and automatic as Lightning payments should be.
tutorial.text3: Nayuta wallet uses a Lightning Service Provider(LSP), which facilitates channel management of the wallet.

qrscanner.errorInvalid: Invalid QR code. Please try again
qrscanner.nodeNotSupported: Not support connections to Lightning Nodes
qrscanner.torNotSupported: Not support connections to Tor nodes
qrscanner.alertOnchainBalance:
Bitcoin address read. 
Currently there is no amount to be refunded.
qrscanner.requestPermission:
You can use the camera to read the QR code.
To enable the camera, tap "Enable" below.

backuppassphrase.text:
Write down these 24 words correctly on a piece of paper. Do not take a screenshot.

If these words are seen by others, your coins will be stolen.
backuppassphrase.confirmDescription: Enter each word from the passphrase you wrote down that corresponds to the number below.

connect.notice: By connecting, you accept the Terms of Use
connect.errorAndroid: This app does not support android
connect.alertNoAppMsg: Hmm... It seems you don't have this app.
connect.alertCopyMsg: Copied to clipboard the connection URL.
connect.author: Author

lapps.descSarutobi: Tap the screen, Swing the monkey, Swipe to fly!
lapps.descLightningCrush: Complete the puzzle and earn Bitcoin!
lapps.descCoinClimber: Jump to win Bitcoin without falling!
lapps.ready2: You can send and receive Bitcoin with this wallet, and also earn Bitcoin by playing at Lapps.
lapps.ready3: Download and play the game from the Lapps screen.

disclaimer.text1: Nayuta Wallet is an application that allows you to manage and send/receive Bitcoin yourself.
disclaimer.text2: Loss of fund while using the app may occur.
disclaimer.text3: We cannot be responsible for the potential damage caused by the app malfunctioning and/or failure to backup the fund.
disclaimer.text4: Use at your own sole risk.

restore.inpurt24words: Input 24 word passhphrase one by one to restore your Bitcoin fund.
restore.startRestoreTextGdrive:
Google SignIn Dialog will be shown.
If you have backup data for this application, please sign in and restore from the backup data.
If you do not sign in, only restore the wallet.

shutdown.restart:
Shutting Down...
As soon as that is done, the application will restart.

permissions.alertUnavailableCamera: Unable to use the device's camera.
permissions.alertCameraText: Allow access to the camera through the settings.

start.text1: By creating or restoring a wallet, you agree to our terms and conditions.

digit.rule: Select the rules for digit separators and decimal separator. (Digit/Decimal)

fee.minimumErr: Custom fee must be set 1sat or more.
fee.notNum:
Invalid Values.
Fee only accepts integer values.

send.notExistChannel: There are no channels available for receiving sats.
send.notEnoughReserve: There is no channel where the your balance exceeds the Min Reserve Balance. It can be checked from each channel details screen.
send.notEnoughLocalAmount:
No channel exists that satisfies the sum of amount in invoice and Max Fee. It can be checked from Channel in Detail Settings.
Would you like to attempt this payment?
send.refundDescription:
Please specify the Bitcoin address to which the refund will be made in the form below.
Within approximately one hour, all Bitcoin not available in our wallet will be transferred to the specified address.
send.repaymentSuccess: The transaction for refund has been broadcasted.
send.noAmountInvoice: Please enter the amount you wish to send.

viaLsp.swapFee:
Deposits are subject to a handling fee. This is chosen whichever is higher the total amount of sats transferred to this address will be multiplied by {{feePercent}} % rate or the minimum fee.
If you accidentally send less than the minimum fee, you will receive a refund minus the transfer fee.
viaLsp.getInbound:
You have no channel that can receive the entered amount.

When be paid for this invoice, a channel is created and you can receive the amount minus the Fee.
viaLsp.otfFeeInstruction: The fee will be determined by multiplying the entered amount by {{otfProportionalFeeRate}} % or the minimum fee of {{otfMinFee}} sats, whichever is higher.
viaLsp.registError:
Server Error.
There is a problem in the LSP.
viaLsp.insufficientOtfFee: Insufficient relay fee. Currently, the fee is {{otfFee}} sats.
viaLsp.informOtf:
A minimum {{otfFee}} sats fee will be charged for the first time or when the available deposit limit has been used up, in order to establish a new limit.
Please take the fee into account when entering the amount.

withdraw.title: Receive
withdraw.getWithdrawFailed: Can not access to the service you are going to receive
withdraw.requestSuccessMessage: Receiving from '{{domain}}' is ongoing. It may take some time before receiving is completed.
withdraw.withdrawaFeatureDescription: Receive feature allow you to move your Bitcoin into Nayuta Wallet from services such as games and exchanges. It may take a some time before receiving is completed
withdraw.lackOfInboundCapacity: The amount you are going to receive exceeds the current maximum receivable amount({{receivableAmount}}). You can raise the limit by receiving more Bitcoin than the current limit in standard receiving.

promotion.freeChannel_greeting1: Thank you for downloading the Nayuta Wallet.
promotion.freeChannel_greeting2: Usually, a fee is required to use Wallet, but we are currently offering a promotion in which the fee is free.
promotion.freeChannel_greeting3: Wallet can be used immediately upon application.
promotion.errorReport:
Unable to execute the process.
Please click "{{sendmail}}" and contact support with the error message written in the body of the message.

integrity.retryError:
There is a problem with the server.
Please run it again after some time.
integrity.networkError:
Failed to connect to server.
Make sure the device is online and run it again.

lnurlPay.title: Send
lnurlPay.sendAmountRange: Please enter an amount between {{minAmount}} and {{maxAmount}}.
lnurlPay.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please start over and try again.
lnurlPay.amountLessThanSat: The specified payment amount for the destination is less than 1 satoshi, so the payment cannot be processed.
lnurlPay.invalidInvoice: The invoice received from the destination is invalid, so the payment cannot be processed.
lnurlPay.requestTimeout: Processing is taking longer than expected. Please wait and try again later.
